AD is as acceptable as CE, however there seems to be an AD/CE compromise below
AD means "Anno Domini" and is from a religious POV. Policy and usage dictates CE is more appropriate for this type of venue
Don't use "C.E" or "B.C.E" It has been and always will be B.C. and A.D.
